sense.def:
Oseba ali stvar, ki je
pathetic
, je žalostna in slabotna ali nemočna in vzbuja pomilovanje in obžalovanje.

seg.quote: It was pathetic to see a man to whom reading meant so much become almost totally blind.

sense.def:
Za človeka ali dejanje lahko rečemo, da je
pathetic
, če sta tako slaba ali šibka, da izgubimo potrpljenje ali se razjezimo.

seg.quote: Our efforts so far have been rather pathetic.
